Api

Class ApiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Api.ApiController

  • @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
 @RestController
public class ApiController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the entry point of server Api , here we receive all urls and treat them

      • getCommands

        @RequestMapping(value="/commands")
public java.util.List<Command> getCommands()
        Get commands list supported by the server . This method is called when receiving http get request with "@/command" url
        Returns:
        server's commands list
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
